1: Bring me justice, God, and plead my cause against an ungodly nation.\q
2:
For you are the God of my strength. Why have you rejected me?\q Why do I go about in mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?


\q
3:
Oh, send out your light and your truth, let them lead me.\q Let them bring me to your holy hill
\q and to your dwelling.
\q
4:
Then I will go to the altar of God,\q to God my exceeding joy.
\q I will praise you with the harp, God, my God.


\q
5:
Why are you bowed down, my soul?\q Why are you upset within me?
\q Hope in God, for again I will praise him who is my salvation and my God.
